RGB Clock

RGB clock is a visual representation of time using the RGB color model. Hours are represented by red in the left column, minutes by green in the middle, and seconds by blue on the right. Each column pulses on the second, and becomes more saturated as the time partition reaches its full value. It was made in collaboration with Allan Lavell, written in JavaScript.
